thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express London City - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: As we expected
thread.title_full: As we expected - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rachel H
title: As we expected
text:
Stayed 2 nights whilst my daughter was at a barbering course at London School of Barbering. Clean and adequate. Breakfast included, good variety of cereal, fruit, toast cooked food or pastries. Free parking for blue badge holders or 30 pounds per day. Friendly, helpful staff.
Room Tip: Quieter at back of hotel. See more room tips
